My uncle's house is situated on a hill. It has very beautiful hilly green rice field scenery.    There is a (1) ... farm at the backyard. My uncle really loves and keeps the chicken well.
The house is not (2)..., but it is lovely and clean. I love staying there. This is the place
where my uncle's family spends most of their time together. It has three bedrooms, a living
room, a dining room, a (3) ..., and two bathrooms.
At the front, there is a living room. Next to this room, there is a dining room. My uncle's
bedroom is near the dining room. The bedroom is (4)... and warm. There is a kitchen and
two bathrooms at the back of the house.
Each room has some furniture. My uncle (5) ... the furniture properly. They are not

related_questions.question:
Simple present Tense (Verbal)    1. She _____ her dog everyday 
A.Feed
B.Feeds
C.To feed
D.Feeding

2. I ____ always go to the dentist 
A.are not
B.do not
C.does not
D.did not

3. When do you ____ a shower? 
A.taking
B.take
C.taken
D.took

4. Q: Do you like to sing? A: … 
A.Yes, I likes to sing
B.Yes, I like to sing
C.Yes, I am liking to sing
D.Yes, I liked to sing

5. Tom and I ____ ____ together. 
A.do surfs
B.do surfing
C.don’t surfing
D.don't surf

6. I ___ breakfast every day at 7 AM 
A.to eat
B.eat
C.eaten
D.ate

7. Q: How do you go to school? A: We ___ the bus to school 
A.riding
B.ridden
C.ride
D.rode

8. Q: When do you do your homework? A: … 
A.I did my homework at 6 PM
B.I am doing my homework at 6 PM
C.I do my homework at 6 PM
D.I have did my homework at 6 PM

9. Q: Do you enjoy playing in the park? A: … 
A.No, I don’t enjoys playing in the park
B.No, I doesn’t enjoy playing in the park
C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park
D.No, I no enjoy playing in the park

10. Q: Does he love his mother? A: … 
A.He love his mother
B.He to love his mother
C.He is loving his mother
D.He loves his mother​

answers.answer:
1. feeds

2. do not

3.take

4. yes, i like to sing

5. do surfing

6. i eat

7.ride

8.C.I do my homework at 6 PM

9.C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park

10.D.He loves his mother

Penjelasan:

simple present tense.

yang artinya masa sekarang. dalam tenses ini menggunakan verb satu dan jika subjek she he it nama orang maka verb bertambahan s

related_questions.question:
Passive voice     1.My brother walks the dog
 The dong ..........by my brother

2.He opened the window
 The window.......by him

3.Someone has stolen my treasure
 My treasure...........

4.The will sell the house 
 The house.......by them

5.Sam is washing the car
 The car.......by sam

6.The girls had eaten the cakes
 The cakes.......by the girls

bantu isi yang titik"nya ya plisee

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. is walked

2. was opened

3. has been stolen by someone

4. will sold

5. is being washed

6. had been eaten
